source.name: EPA Water Services - Navigation Service
source.description: The Navigation service is a subset component of the Upstream/Downstream service designed to provide standard stream network traversal.  The traversal request may include a description of where, on the stream network, to begin the traversal, and a description of where or how to end the traversal.  All Upstream/Downstream executions require a navigation type and at least one start point.  All other input parameters are optional.
